com.google.android.pinnedheader.headerlist

Interface PinnedHeaderListView.PinnedHeaderAdapter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HeaderAdapter
    Enclosing class:
    PinnedHeaderListView

    public static interface PinnedHeaderListView.PinnedHeaderAdapter
    Adapter interface. The list adapter must implement this interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configurePinnedHeaders(PinnedHeaderListView listView)
      Configures the pinned headers to match the visible list items.
      int getPinnedHeaderCount()
      Returns the overall number of pinned headers, visible or not.
      android.view.View getPinnedHeaderView(int viewIndex, android.view.View convertView, android.view.ViewGroup parent)
      Creates or updates the pinned header view.
      int getScrollPositionForHeader(int viewIndex)
      Returns the list position to scroll to if the pinned header is touched.

    • Method Detail

      • getPinnedHeaderCount

        int getPinnedHeaderCount()
        Returns the overall number of pinned headers, visible or not.

      • getPinnedHeaderView

        android.view.View getPinnedHeaderView(int viewIndex,
                                    android.view.View convertView,
                                    android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Creates or updates the pinned header view.

      • configurePinnedHeaders

        void configurePinnedHeaders(PinnedHeaderListView listView)
        Configures the pinned headers to match the visible list items. The adapter should call PinnedHeaderListView.setHeaderPinnedAtTop(int, int, boolean), PinnedHeaderListView.setHeaderPinnedAtBottom(int, int, boolean), PinnedHeaderListView.setFadingHeader(int, int, boolean) or PinnedHeaderListView.setHeaderInvisible(int, boolean), for each header that needs to change its position or visibility.

      • getScrollPositionForHeader

        int getScrollPositionForHeader(int viewIndex)
        Returns the list position to scroll to if the pinned header is touched. Return -1 if the list does not need to be scrolled.
